metadata.title: HPC Standards - Complete Scope
metadata.source: HPC Standards Books I, II (Vol. I & II), III, IV
metadata.description: Comprehensive HPC standards database covering all extracted standards, specifications, design rules, and standard parts

book_i.title: Standards Book I - Engineering Procedures
book_i.focus: Drawing management, part numbering, checking procedures

book_ii_vol_i.title: Standards Book II Vol. I - GA & Assembly, Mechanicals
book_ii_vol_i.focus: General arrangement, machinery mounts, fans, shafts, doors
key_standards: Vibration switch mounting: 1' from fan centerline, 6" from top
Diagonal brace spacing: 1" to 6-1/4" in 1/4" increments

book_ii_vol_ii.title: Standards Book II Vol. II - Structural, Frames, Walkways
book_ii_vol_ii.focus: Tube bundle frames, walkways, ladders, handrails, structural frames
key_standards: TBF diverter locations (aligned with clip angle)
Toe-plate design: PRL 4-1/2" x 2" x 1/4" welded component
Handrail detailing: plan-view, single line method
Standard part numbering conventions (W88__ vs W8__)

book_iii.title: Standards Book III - Header Design
book_iii.focus: Header design, welding, joint preparation, standard parts
key_standards: Header nameplate thickness: 0.105" (reduced from 0.125" for cost)

book_iv.title: Standards Book IV - Standard Parts Library
book_iv.focus: Comprehensive standard parts library (bolted, welded, tube supports)
key_standards: Extension rings: 6" deep for aftermarket fan sales
Welding requirements: AWS and CSA compliance
Header stops: W728 (moved from bolted to welded)

standard_parts.notes: Default lifting lug for Hood Program

requirements.quantity_rule: 4 lifting lugs for units with 50' or 60' long tubes or greater
drawing_references: F 7REF8 - 1 FAN ND SUP & LUG LOC.
notes: Hood Program defaults to W708 lifting lug
Need to check lifting lug size for air seal block outs
Non-standard lifting lug locations must be verified
Lifting lug center line location is critical

location_data_status.coordinates_source: Standards Book II Vol. II, Pages 120, 125-127

standard_drawing.title: TYPICAL TIE-DOWN AND HEADER ANCHOR DETAILS

non_standard_movement.description: For non-standard movement, use: TOTAL MOVEMENT + 1/16"

anchor_bolt_plans.description: Anchor Bolt Plans are provided for all winterized units without floors and per customer's request
requirements: All column centerlines and anchor bolts requirements are located on the Anchor Bolt Plan
Details of column base plate, ladder base shown on Anchor Bolt Plan when space permits
If space doesn't permit, details shown on plan/plan of plenum
Anchor Bolt plan is the second General Arrangement drawing if KEY PLAN is required (listed as drawing 11 A 1)
anchor_bolt_plans.standard_note: FOUNDATION AND ANCHOR BOLTS: HPC standard note is TO BE PROVIDED BY OTHERS

vibration_switch_mounting.description: The center location for vibration switches is standardized to 1' from the fan centerline and 6" from the top

diagonal_brace_spacing.description: Spacing from the c-channel stiffener to the plan brace will be in even 1/4" increments, with the spacing existing between 1" and 6-1/4"

nameplate_thickness.description: Header nameplate thickness reduced from 0.125" to 0.105"

beam_shapes.description: Beam shape changes for price and availability

extension_rings.description: Extension rings: 6" deep for aftermarket fan sales

header_stops.change: Moved from bolted to welded section
header_stops.description: Header stops moved from bolted to welded

welding_requirements.description: Welding requirements: AWS and CSA compliance

tube_support_standards.description: Maximum tube support spacing is 5'-9" (5.75 feet)
tube_support_standards.note: Tube support spacing varies by tube length and configuration

standards_database.note: Extend StandardsDB with HPC data classes and lookup methods

validators.handling_validator: agents/cad_agent/validators/handling_validator.py - Enhance with HPC lifting lug checks
validators.hpc_mechanical_validator: Create new validator for machinery mounts, fans, vibration switches
validators.hpc_walkway_validator: Create new validator for walkways, ladders, handrails
validators.hpc_header_validator: Create new validator for header design standards

design_recommender.note: Incorporate HPC design rules into design recommender system

knowledge_base.note: Add HPC procedures to RAG system (ChromaDB) for semantic search
